item.title: This Simple Trick Will Have You Flying a RC Paper Airplane in No Time!
item.description: Introduction Are you looking for a fun, inexpensive way to spend your free time? Flying a RC paper airplane is the perfect activity for you! In this article, weâ€™ll discuss the basics of RC paper airplanes, show you the steps to get your own up in the air, and explain the benefits of this activity. Definition of RC Paper Airplane A RC paper airplane is a model airplane that is powered by a remote control.
